https://tmrev.io/movie/728212-Between the World and Me 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rHntazEQuvO0wSplvOxf5wNdvFO.jpg Based on Ta-Nehisi Coates’ #1 New York Times bestseller and originally adapted and staged by the Apollo Theater, this special combines elements of that production - including powerful readings from Coates’ book - with documentary footage from the actors’ home life, archival footage, and animation. Between the World and Me
